channel.title: Save On The Persol PO2947V
channel.description: Persol is an Italian company specialising in sunglasses, though becoming just as well known for prescription eyewear. The company was founded in 1913 by Turin based optician, Giuseppe Ratti. Originally, Ratti wanted to make protective and safe, but comfortable, glasses for pilots and sports drivers. He did this by creating the ‘Protectors’; an iconic and [...]

item.title: Save On The Persol PO2947V
item.description:
Persol is an Italian company specialising in sunglasses, though becoming just as well known for prescription eyewear. The company was founded in 1913 by Turin based optician, Giuseppe Ratti. Originally, Ratti wanted to make protective and safe, but comfortable, glasses for pilots and sports drivers. He did this by creating the ‘Protectors’; an iconic and [...]
